spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall layout follows the blueprint well. Significant deviation in door orientation; bathroom and study doors open into the hallway instead of into rooms. Kitchen window is missing on the bottom wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Bathroom wall is missing a segment in the 3D render (opening up towards the hallway without a full frame). Room adjacencies are mostly correct, though door swing logic is reversed for several threshold points.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scaling is consistent. Furniture placement accurately reflects the blueprint, particularly in the living and dining areas.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is soft and professional. Geometry is clean with high visual clarity. Orthographic projection is well-maintained.

detected_errors.description: Doors to the twin bedroom, bathroom, and office swing into the hallway rather than into the rooms as specified.
Kitchen window on the bottom exterior wall is missing in the 3D render.
The partition wall separating the bathroom from the hallway is missing its top header or door frame logic.
Radiator placement in the master bedroom and living room is shifted relative to wall corners in the plan.
